Title: Digital Branding Efforts In Increasing Brand Recognition Towards Millennial (A Study On Social Media Content Of Hero Supermarket)
Source title: International Journal of Scientific and Technology Research
Affiliations: Communication Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Febriana, D., Communication Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Yunus, U., Communication Department, Faculty of Economics and Communication, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: This study described how digital branding efforts that have been done by HERO Supermarket to increase brand recognition toward millennials generation. This research used qualitative approach with interview and observation as primary data and journals as the secondary data. The study showed how to do digital branding to approach millennials by using social media that can generate engagement and exposure that impacts brand recognition. Few things must be considered to do digital branding; business objectives, target audience objectives, value, user journey, social media usage, contents, and engagements. All these things must together align with their value and integrated with offline activity. © 2019 International Journal Of Scientific and Technology Research. All rights reserved.
Author Keywords: Brand recognition; Digital branding; Grocery retail; Millennials; Social media contents
